card_name: Mr. Skath of the Brain Gang
rules_text: When Mr. Skath enters, search your graveyard or library for a card named Dead Man Walkin' and put it onto the battlefield, then arm it. If you searched your library this way, shuffle. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
